State Regulations
TABLE I
CLASSIFICATIONS AND STANDARDS OF QUALITY AND PURITY
ASSIGNED TO FRESH SURFACE WATERS WITHIN DRAINAGE BASINS OF STREAMS ENTERING THE
HUDSON RIVER IN ORANGE, ULSTER, DUTCHESS, AND PUTNAM COUNTIES, EXCEPT RONDOUT
CREEK BELOW RONDOUT RESERVOIR, ESOPUS CREEK BELOW ASHOKAN RESERVOIR, WAPPINGER
CREEK, WATERS CONTAINED WITHIN BOUNDARIES OF STATE-OWNED FOREST PRESERVE LANDS
AND THOSE PORTIONS OF VARIOUS WATERS IN SAID BASINS FOR WHICH STANDARDS HAVE
BEEN PREVIOUSLY ADOPTED BY THE WATER RESOURCES COMMISSION. Item
